com.taplytics.sdk

Interface TaplyticsCodeExperimentListener


  • public interface TaplyticsCodeExperimentListener

    Interface for a Taplytics code experiment, one of the baselineVariation(java.util.Map) or experimentVariation(String, java.util.Map) methods will be called only once.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void baselineVariation(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> variables)
      Baseline method, called for the baseline of the code experiment
      void experimentUpdated()
      This method is called whenever the experiment is updated from the server.
      void experimentVariation(java.lang.String variationName, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> variables)
      Variation Method, called for selected variation of the code experiment.

    • Method Detail

      • baselineVariation

        void baselineVariation(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> variables)
        Baseline method, called for the baseline of the code experiment
        Parameters:
        variables - experiment baseline variables, String key of variable name, String or Number as value.

      • experimentVariation

        void experimentVariation(java.lang.String variationName,
                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> variables)
        Variation Method, called for selected variation of the code experiment. the selected varaition's name and variables will be passed to this method.
        Parameters:
        variationName - the name of the selected variation.
        variables - selected variation's variables, String key of variable name, String or Number as value.

      • experimentUpdated

        void experimentUpdated()
        This method is called whenever the experiment is updated from the server. You can choose to run your experiment again within this method to update it. This method is primarily used when using the Taplytics shake menu to test your different experiments and variations.
